buildCommand.description: The neu build command will execute this command before generating the app bundle, so you can generate bundled version of host project code.

buildPath.description: Location where the final ready-to-distribute host project files will be stored after the execution of buildCommand. Files in this folder are copied into the app bundle path after the execution of neu build command.

devCommand.description: This command will run with the neu run command to start the host project.

initCommand.description: A command that gets executed after downloading a host app template with the neu create command.
